description:
We are looking for a National Sales Manager to attract new fabricators in the window covering industry to use our pioneering tech innovation software!

As the National Sales Manager you have a proven track record of success in growing sales, experience with the custom window treatment industry, and industry connections to jump start our growth. In this role you will sell software services, focusing on the features and benefits and demonstrating them to your clients. This is a B2B sales management position.
• *This is a W-2, full-time, fully remote position within the US - MUST reside in the US for this position.

BENEFITS
• Salary of $75k - $85k base salary plus commission
• No Commissions caps (double salary feasible in year one)
• Plus a sign-on bonus!
• Company matching retirement plan
• PTO, Paid Holidays & Birthday off with Pay
• Discounted, pretax Aflac plan offered
• Costco Membership offered
• Work week - Monday to Friday 8:30 am - 5:00 pm ET
• Fully remote position within the US - working from your home office
• Fully reimbursed business travel to only include: travel to our corporate offices, trade shows and occasional client visits (limited travel required)
• Paid in-depth training in North Carolina

ROLE RESPONSIBILITIES
• Design, develop and implement sales strategies and goals within the window fashion industry
• Grow and manage the sales pipeline through lead generation, networking, existing lead
• outreach, research for cold outreach and external industry outreach
• Present and demonstrate solutions to leads based upon discovery processes
• Coordinate with product development team for lead specific solutions
• Coordinate with internal sales support team for lead nurturing
• Coordinate with marketing team to drive lead generation
• Work with Support, Product Development and Development team to drive system innovation and go to market strategies
• Attend Trade shows, conferences and conventions as warranted (limited travel is required)

MUST HAVES
• Industry Experience: In Retail, Fabrication and or Workrooms businesses and the nuances and knowledge required for each would be a key qualification for these B2B relationships.
• Experience with Window Treatments or Window Treatment POS systems a plus.
• Team Player: Sales can require the support of several departments, so working as a team and respecting all team members is required
• Software Expertise: The ability to easily learn the operations and details of a software system design and translate customer needs and requirements into solutions within a system or systems
• Opportunity Research: With systems and solutions knowledge, a successful Sales Manager must be able to identify and qualify opportunities and continually fill a pipeline of sales leads
• Relationship Management: Experience in B2B relationships within the window fashion industry
• Written communication: A key to good client relationships is good, clear and convincing communication. Most sales will be remote, so excellent verbal and written communication skills are a must

APPLY NOW! We look forward to sharing more about our company and this exciting position with you.

Behind The Design and all Affiliated Employers are proud to be Equal Employment Opportunity and affirmative action employers.
